title: Error Code 003
body:
Can you said me how to fix this problem?  {{champion:92}} 

https://i.imgur.com/1ymt42y.png

replies.body: Hey there, this error usually results from a network block that can't reach our services.  Run through our steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.
